title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh: Friendly Tails
overview: CGI-animated adventure with Pooh and his friends. Join Pooh, Tigger, and the rest of the crew as they explore the Hundred Acre Wood in this fun-filled adventure. The friends do some sleuthing to solve the mysteries of a lost puppy and a case of the hiccups, as well as learning some important lessons about friendship.
